st: Paathumma ayishumma nabeesumma kadeesumma hadeesumma hajjumma beepathumma cheriyumma mariyumma kunjumma Pinna enda umma onumkudy ninda vallumma

st: Rater Akase takale dakhi lokkho Tarar mela, Ak Chad ka ghira e jano tader joto khela, Bondo onek pawa jai baralay hat, Amar kacha tui ja Bondo..Oi Akaser e Chad!

st: sandha tara snato tumi paschima lal akash, himangsu tumi khatriya nari boiye subatash. elomelo janajirna ami sirna bastu dangai, barbar venge pari tabu guchiye dao amai

st: Na jena na suna kokhono,Diyo nako mon. Valo kore aage take jane nao,Sa kamon doron. Aabeg ta komia aalap ta jomia aage jena nao tar vator goron..Pore dio Mon!
s: Na jena na suna kokhono,Diyo nako mon. Valo kore aage take jane nao,Sa kamon doron. Aabeg ta komia aalap ta jomia aage jena nao tar vator goron..Pore dio Mon!

st: Bastota amake dayna obosor, Tai bola vabona amai sarthopor, jakhane e thaki, thaki joto e dura… Tumi aacho sarakhon ai hridoy jura

st: Tumi akhon bondo…amar khub Dear, Amakeo rakho tumar… ridoyer Near, God chara kaoka tumi…karona Fear Dekhba kovo jibona tumar…asbena Tear
s: Tumi akhon bondo…amar khub Dear, Amakeo rakho tumar… ridoyer Near, God chara kaoka tumi…karona Fear Dekhba kovo jibona tumar…asbena Tear

st: premer khelay porajito ami, tomar mokhe bijoyinir hashi. tomar hate shokher shakha, ami bajai bedonar bashi. tomar e shajano khelay ami, here gesi niyotir likhone. se likha aj bar bar pori, nirjon nistobdo oronno bihone.. shoto unonoy golate pareni, tomar krittim pathore hridoy. bar bar tate prarthona thoke, jiboner bodh hoye gese khoy.. tubo ami toma k e chai, nei ...
s: premer khelay porajito ami, tomar mokhe bijoyinir hashi. tomar hate shokher shakha, ami bajai bedonar bashi. tomar e shajano khelay ami, here gesi niyotir likhone. se likha aj bar bar pori, nirjon nistobdo oronno bihone.. shoto unonoy golate pareni, tomar krittim pathore hridoy. bar bar tate prarthona thoke, jiboner bodh hoye gese khoy.. tubo ami toma k e chai, nei ...

st: amar shopno joladharay tomi, rimjhim shore jhora brishty. amar hridoy canvus jore, tomi amar e uporbo srishty. amar shiter metho pothe tomi, amar e chitano nishpap shishir. amar gudholir akashe tomi, amar e rangano roktim abir.. amar josnar shonali aloy tomi, amar e bajano bashir shoor. amar grishmer tibrotay tomi, valobashar klanto olosh dopor… amar rater akashe tomi, megher kole ...
s: amar shopno joladharay tomi, rimjhim shore jhora brishty. amar hridoy canvus jore, tomi amar e uporbo srishty. amar shiter metho pothe tomi, amar e chitano nishpap shishir. amar gudholir akashe tomi, amar e rangano roktim abir.. amar josnar shonali aloy tomi, amar e bajano bashir shoor. amar grishmer tibrotay tomi, valobashar klanto olosh dopor… amar rater akashe tomi, megher kole ...

st: ami tho ek tochcho manosh pai nai kono shokh apon bhabi jakei ami shei dei amai dokh. dokhkho bhora jibon tathe bishshash aj nishshesher pothe tobo bishshash kori shodho ekto bhalobashar khoje. jani ami bhalo kore bhalobasha kobho ashbe na kache mone mone boli shodho “akanka theke shorabo na hat bashona amar shiddho na hole” balobashar morichikai ghori miche pai ...
